sentences.sContent: I have two brothers, William and Mark.
sentences.sCn: 我有两个兄弟，威廉和马克。

sentences.sContent: My big brother (=  older brother  ) has always looked after me.
...said Addison probably overheard a conversation between family members talking about the funds needed to get her little brother to treatment...
...A 9-year-old girl in New Mexico has raised more than $500 for her little brother who needs heart surgery in Houston...
...Pete Gentry in North Carolina rescued his brother who is choking on food...

phrases.pCn: 同母异父（或同父异母）兄弟

words.tran: 兄弟的；兄弟般的；亲切的
兄弟关系；手足情谊；四海之内皆兄弟的信念

trans.tranOther: a male who has the same parents as you
